content: I love snapchat but this doesn’t quite make sense to me. Maybe I’m not the target market, but…it feels like using Twitter to post 1000-word blog posts. Sure, you could do that, but it’s kinda forced and there are better venues to do it (and better use cases for Twitter). Snapchat and Twitter feel a lot alike in that they both impose constraints that force people into a shorter form than they’re used to, which can be great. Why force old forms into this new, smaller box?
